title: Campaign Offer Response Detail
description: An Offer Proposition Detail is used to capture the details about an Offer Proposition.

xdm:offer.title: Campaign Offer Detail
xdm:offer.description: Snapshot of the Offer that the recipient responded to. The object contains a at least the xdm:id property value which is the identifier of an Offer.

xdm:eligibilityRule.title: Eligibility Rule
xdm:eligibilityRule.description: The reference to an eligibility rule that tests a condition using the profile and/or other contextual XDM instances. The value is the URI (@id) of the eligibility rule that is referenced. See schema https://ns.adobe.com/experience/offer-management/eligibility-rule
